member.name: T:Microsoft.Usd.Common.Utilities.SignatureValidator
member.summary: Compares the signing certificates of the two processes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Usd.Common.Utilities.SignatureValidator.IsValidSignature(System.String)

member.param: File name along with full path of the assembly.
